definitions.definition_math: Curves obtained by intersecting a plane with a double cone.
definitions.definition_eng: Parabola, ellipse, and hyperbola formed by slicing a cone.

definitions.definition_math: Set of points equidistant from a fixed point (focus) and line (directrix)
definitions.definition_eng: U-shaped curve defined by focus–directrix property.
Set of points where the sum of distances to two foci is constant.
Set of points where the absolute difference of distances to foci is constant.

definitions.definition_math: e = c/a (for ellipse), e = c/a > 1 (for hyperbola)
definitions.definition_eng: Measure of how stretched a conic is.
